DataElement.preferredName: Disease Progression Confirmation Return To Clinical Study Site Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which the confirmation of disease progression was returned to a healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease Progression Confirmation Return To Clinical Study Site
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The worsening of a disease over time._Having been established or verified._To give something back, or the getting back thereof._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Cancer that continues to grow or spread.

Concepts.definition: A process that manifests as the worsening of a disease over time.

Property.preferredName: Confirmation Return To Clinical Study Site
Property.preferredDefinition: Having been established or verified.:To give something back, or the getting back thereof.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.

Concepts.definition: To give something back, or the getting back thereof.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
